ComicInfo.Series: Dark Horse Classics: Terror of Godzilla
ComicInfo.Summary: *Overview* Something monstrous rises up from the sea and nearly sinks a Japanese fishing boat. The sole survivor tells a tale that no one wants to believe. But when a Russian nuclear submarine is destroyed in the same waters, the world is forced to face the truth: Godzilla has returned! In color for the very first time anywhere, this mangaclassic was originally published by Dark Horse in black and white in 1988.
ComicInfo.Writer: Kazuhisa Iwata,Mike Richardson,Randy Stradley,Kazuhisa Iwata,Mike Richardson,Randy Stradley
